AT.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
AT.description: Bei der Erkundung einer rätselhaften Insel wird Kirby vom bösen Anführer der Schädli-Bande in zehn Kopien seiner selbst geteilt. Um den Fluch rückgängig zu machen, muss Kirby alle seine Klone finden und die Bande besiegen. Kirby™ Mass Attack wird mit dem Touchpen und dem Touchscreen deines Wii U™ GamePad gespielt. Finde Kirbys Kopien und leite bis zu zehn von ihnen gleichzeitig, indem du auf den Touchscreen tippst. Je mehr Klone du unter Kontrolle hast, desto stärker bist du; manche Hindernisse können nur mit der richtigen Anzahl von Kirby-Klonen überwunden werden!

AU.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
AU.description: Upon exploring a mysterious island, Kirby gets divided into 10 copies of himself by the evil leader of the Skull Gang. Kirby must gather all of his clones and defeat the gang to reverse the curse. Kirby™ Mass Attack is played with the stylus and touch screen of your Wii U™ GamePad. Find the copies of Kirby and guide up to 10 of them at the same time by tapping on the screen. The more clones of Kirby you control, the stronger you are; some obstacles can only be passed by having the right amount!

BG.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
BG.description: Upon exploring a mysterious island, Kirby gets divided into 10 copies of himself by the evil leader of the Skull Gang. Kirby must gather all of his clones and defeat the gang to reverse the curse. Kirby™ Mass Attack is played with the stylus and touch screen of your Wii U™ GamePad. Find the copies of Kirby and guide up to 10 of them at the same time by tapping on the screen. The more clones of Kirby you control, the stronger you are; some obstacles can only be passed by having the right amount!

BE.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
BE.description: Pendant qu'il visitait une île mystérieuse, Kirby se retrouva dédoublé en 10 copies de lui-même par le démoniaque chef des Crânos. Kirby doit maintenant récupérer tous ses clones et vaincre le gang s'il veut rompre la malédiction. Kirby™ Mass Attack se joue au stylet sur l'écran tactile de votre Wii U™ GamePad. Retrouvez les clones de Kirby et guider un maximum de 10 copies à la fois en touchant l'écran. Plus vous contrôlez de clones, plus vous êtes puissant. Certains obstacles ne peuvent être franchis qu'en utilisant le nombre de clones adéquat !

ES.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
ES.description: Mientras Kirby está explorando una isla misteriosa, el malvado líder de la Tropa calavera lo divide en diez copias de sí mismo. Kirby deberá reunir a todos sus clones y derrotar a la banda para romper la maldición. Para jugar a Kirby™ Mass Attack, debes utilizar el lápiz y la pantalla táctil de tu Wii U™ GamePad. Encuentra a las copias de Kirby y dirige a hasta 10 de ellas al mismo tiempo tocando la pantalla. Cuantos más clones de Kirby controles, más fuerte serás. ¡Hay algunos obstáculos que solo podrás superar si cuentas con un número concreto de copias!

IT.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
IT.description: Mentre esplora un'isola misteriosa, Kirby viene suddiviso in dieci copie di se stesso dal malvagio capo della Banda degli Spiriteschi. Adesso deve riunire tutti i suoi cloni per poter sconfiggere la banda e annullare la maledizione! In Kirby™ Mass Attack giochi usando lo stilo e il touch screen del tuo Wii U™ GamePad. Trova le copie di Kirby e arriva a controllarne dieci in una volta toccando lo schermo. Più cloni controlli, più forte sarai: alcuni ostacoli possono essere superati solo se hai il giusto numero di cloni!

NL.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
NL.description: Terwijl hij een mysterieus eiland verkent, wordt Kirby in tien kopieën van zichzelf opgesplitst door de kwade leider van de Skull Gang. Kirby moet al zijn klonen verzamelen en de bende verslaan om de vloek ongedaan te maken. Kirby™ Mass Attack wordt gespeeld met behulp van de stylus en het touchscreen van je Wii U™ GamePad. Spoor de kopieën van Kirby op en begeleid er tot tien tegelijk door op het scherm te tikken. Hoe meer Kirbyklonen je bestuurt, hoe sterker je bent; sommige obstakels kun je alleen overwinnen met het juiste aantal!

NZ.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
NZ.description: Upon exploring a mysterious island, Kirby gets divided into 10 copies of himself by the evil leader of the Skull Gang. Kirby must gather all of his clones and defeat the gang to reverse the curse. Kirby™ Mass Attack is played with the stylus and touch screen of your Wii U™ GamePad. PL.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
PL.description: Upon exploring a mysterious island, Kirby gets divided into 10 copies of himself by the evil leader of the Skull Gang. Kirby must gather all of his clones and defeat the gang to reverse the curse. Kirby™ Mass Attack is played with the stylus and touch screen of your Wii U™ GamePad. Find the copies of Kirby and guide up to 10 of them at the same time by tapping on the screen. PT.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
PT.description: Ao explorar uma ilha misteriosa, o Kirby é dividido em dez cópias de si próprio pelo terrível líder do Skull Gang. O Kirby terá de reunir todos os seus clones e derrotar este bando de criminosos para reverter a maldição. Kirby™ Mass Attack é jogado com o stylus e com o ecrã tátil do teu Wii U™ GamePad. Encontra as cópias do Kirby e, tocando no ecrã, guia até dez ao mesmo tempo. Quantos mais clones do Kirby controlares, mais forte serás. Alguns obstáculos apenas poderão ser ultrapassados com o número certo de cópias sob o teu controlo!

RU.name: Kirby™ Mass Attack
RU.description: Во время исследования загадочного острова, Kirby попадает в беду, так как зловещий лидер банды Skull Gang разделяет его на 10 точных копий. Kirby предстоит найти всех своих клонов и победить банду злодеев, чтобы снять с себя проклятие. Для игры в Kirby™ Mass Attack вам нужно использовать стилус и сенсорный экран вашего Wii U™ GamePad. Найдите все копии Kirby и управляйте ими (в общем количестве не больше десяти) одновременно, касаясь экрана. Чем больше клонов Kirby вы контролируете, тем сильнее вы становитесь. Некоторые препятствия можно преодолеть только в том случае, если у вас под контролем определенное количество клонов!
